title: ICYMI: Fashionista x Bluboho, Romeo & Juliet Costumes & The Hottest Brands in Q3

html:
• Home
  • News

A must-read roundup of our most popular stories of the week.

In case you missed them, we've rounded up our most popular stories of the week to help you stay in the loop. No need to thank us — just toast a pumpkin spice latte in our honor when you're discussing who did what over apple cider donuts.

HOW BROADWAY'S REVIVAL OF 'ROMEO AND JULIET' CAPTURES GEN Z THROUGH FASHION-FORWARD COSTUME DESIGN 
Costume designer Enver Chakartash walks Fashionista through the show's modern wardrobe featuring brands like Ludovic de Saint Sernin, Y-3 and Adidas.

THE ERA OF 'CHAOTIC CUSTOMIZATION' IS UPON US: INSIDE THE GEN Z-FUELED ACCESSORIES TREND
Accessories for accessories and other personalized details are predicted to dominate the market into 2026. Get a head start now.

MIU MIU IS ONCE AGAIN THE WORLD'S HOTTEST BRAND FOR Q3
Plus, the commercial rise of Pieter Mulier's Alaïa, Ralph Lauren's sports bump and more from the latest Lyst Index.

CHRISTOPHER JOHN ROGERS X J.CREW BRINGS THE DESIGNER'S BOLD AESTHETIC TO THE MASSES
The limited-edition collection — spanning cashmere sweaters, topcoats and childrenswear — is available to shop now.

THE LEATHER JACKET TRENDS TO INVEST IN NOW, ACCORDING TO THE RUNWAYS
From bombers to blazers, shop the best real and faux leather outerwear on the market.

Scroll to Continue

Recommended Articles

VIOLETTE_FR AND MAISON ALEXANDRA GOLOVANOFF LAUNCH BEAUTY-AND-FASHION COLLABORATION INSPIRED BY PARISIAN NIGHTLIFE
In a nod to the red lights illuminating the city after dark, the two French brands teamed up on "rouge noir" beauty and fashion offerings.

HOW I SHOP: DOMO WELLS
"My style is always going to be something that's evolving, but I feel more settled in it right now than I ever have," says the mutidisciplinary creative director.

HOW JENNIFER BEHR TRANSFORMED THE HAIR ACCESSORY CATEGORY
The founder discussed packing orders in her living room, the "Gossip Girl" effect, the rise of the bow trend and potential new categories, live The Fashionista Network.

HOW OUR JEWELRY COLLABORATION WITH BLUBOHO CAME TOGETHER
The limited-edition Bluboho x Fashionista Future Self Envelope Charm and Moonstone Charm Bracelet are available now! Both are priced under $200 and made to last.

Homepage photo: Courtesy of Bluboho

Tune into the Fashionista Network to join the conversation with fashion and beauty industry leaders. Sign up here.
